scripts.dev: concurrently -n case,auth,gateway -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev --workspace=apps/case-service" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/auth-service" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/gateway"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=apps/case-service && npm run build --workspace=apps/auth-service && npm run build --workspace=apps/gateway
scripts.start: concurrently -n case,auth,gateway -c blue,green,magenta "npm run start --workspace=apps/case-service" "npm run start --workspace=apps/auth-service" "npm run start --workspace=apps/gateway"
scripts.i-all: npm install && npm install --workspace=apps/case-service && npm install --workspace=apps/auth-service
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist libs/*/dist **/*.tsbuildinfo && shx rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
